data.title: Rooftop Cinema Club Embarcadero
data.meta_description: Enjoy the ultimate open-air cinema experience near the San Diego coast with stunning skyline views!
data.text:
Address: 1 Market Place, San Diego, CA 92101

Transportation & parking: Guests can self-park at the Manchester Grand Hyatt’s garage (just off the hotel’s main entrance on W Harbor Dr) for $11 for up to 4 hours with a validation from the cinema box office. If the hotel’s garage is full there is a surface lot directly behind the hotel in the Seaport Village, parking rates vary by stay length. Alternatively, you can arrive via the San Diego Trolley (Green Line), just hop off at the Seaport Village Station and you will be directly across the street from the hotel.

Getting to the rooftop: The cinema is located on the 4th Floor Sports Courts of the Harbor Tower in the Manchester Grand Hyatt Hotel. From the hotel garage, exit the elevator on the ground floor and follow the signs to the Harbor Tower. You will pass The Landing bar in the lobby and reach the Harbor Tower elevators or escalators to get to the 4th floor. Once you reach the 4th floor, follow the Rooftop Cinema Club signs (or the wayfinding signs for the Sports Courts). If using the elevator, turn right at the fitness center/pool sign. From the hotel lobby, turn left and walk in the direction of the Harbor Tower, when you reach The Landing bar turn right and you will find the Harbor tower elevators or escalators to the 4th floor. Once you reach the 4th floor, follow the Rooftop Cinema Club signs (or the wayfinding signs for the Sports Courts).

Seating and Layout: We offer two different seating types at this venue: an Adirondack chair for one and a double-width Adirondack Loveseat for two. In addition, all seats in our Premium section include footrests. Please see below for the seating layout. (Click image to view in a separate window)

Tickets: Prices range from $11 – $28, depending on seating section, seat type, ticket inclusions and time of day.

Discounts: Active, retired and family of military personnel enjoy 15% off with voucher code: EmbarcaderoMilitary2024. Any form of valid military ID required as proof at venue. Students enjoy 10% off with voucher code: EmbarcaderoStudent2024. Active Student ID or Student Schedule required as proof at venue.

No Reserved Seating: Guests are seated on a first-come, first-served basis. We always encourage guests to arrive early and all together to ensure they can select their preferred seats.

Age policy: Unless otherwise noted, screenings starting prior to 4pm are open to all ages. Screenings starting between 4-7pm are open to teens 13+. Screenings after 7pm are for guests 18+ only. Anyone under the age of 18 must be accompanied by an adult (18+). Please note, our one-size headphones are best suited for children ages 5 and up.

First call: Bar service is only available for screenings starting after 4:30pm. If you attend an earlier screening you can grab a tipple at one of the many bars within the Manchester Grand Hyatt hotel.

The Great Outdoors: The rooftop is fully exposed to the elements so please check the weather before attending. During daytime screenings you may want to apply sunblock, cover your shoulders and wear a hat, and on cool evenings bring a jacket or your favorite blanket.

Transfers: All ticket sales are final and non-refundable. However, we know plans can change so you are welcome to transfer your tickets to a different screening at any point before your original screening Start Time at no cost. For more information, please check out our Ticket Transfer Instructions page. If you need additional flexibility, consider adding Refund Protection to your tickets during check-out.

Weather Disruptions: We make every effort for our screenings to go ahead. However, if inclement weather will affect your movie experience, we’ll cancel the screening and notify you at least one hour prior to the film start time via email with details on how to transfer your tickets to another screening (or obtain a refund if you purchased Refund Protection). You can always check the current status of a screening on its thumbnail visible on the venue page.

Cashless operations: We are a cashless business, so please come prepared with your debit or credit card to purchase food and beverage onsite.

No BYO: Outside food or drinks will not be allowed into the venue.

Guest Behavior: We are Social Cinema – talk, laugh, text and snap to your heart’s content, but please be respectful of other guest’s experience, especially once the film begins. Unruly, disruptive or unnecessarily loud guests will be asked to leave.
